name: crm-project
description: Full-stack CRM application with Gmail integration and user management

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PORT=3002 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3002/api npm run dev
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start:standalone: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3002 node dist/index.js
